chunks.title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
chunks.text: In this video, we will see how CSS is added to an HTML page.

chunks.title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
chunks.text: CSS has three ways to add to HTML.

chunks.title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
chunks.text: The first is inline CSS, which is used for style attributes and is added to HTML pages.

chunks.title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
chunks.text: The second way is internal CSS.

chunks.title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
chunks.text: Internal CSS means tag a style and put it in the HTML page style tag.

chunks.title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
chunks.text: The most used is external CSS.
